paramInformation.label: Activate / deactivate functions ALL ON / ALL OFF

options.label: ALL ON disabled, ALL of disabled
ALL ON disabled, AL OFF active
ALL ON active, ALL OFF disabled
ALL ON active, ALL OFF active

paramInformation.label: Auto-Off Timer
paramInformation.description: Turn OFF automatically after a period defined in this parameter.

paramInformation.label: Auto-On Timer
paramInformation.description: Turn ON automatically after a period of time defined in this parameter.

paramInformation.label: Timer Settings Unit
paramInformation.description: Set Timer Units to Seconds or Milliseconds

options.label: Does not restore last on/off status

paramInformation.label: Power Consumption Reporting Threshold
paramInformation.description: Percentage of increase or decrease to be reported.

paramInformation.label: Power Consumption Reporting Interval
paramInformation.description: Time interval for power consumption reports (30 â€“ 32535 seconds).

paramInformation.label: Associated Devices Action
paramInformation.description: In case of exceeding defined power values

options.label: turn on, once the power drops below lower power threshold
turn off, once the power drops below lower power threshold
turn on, once the power rises above upper power threshold
turn off, once the power rises above upper power threshold
Turn on, once the power drops below lower power threshold. Turn off, once the power rises above upper power threshold
Turn off, once the power drops below lower power threshold. Turn on, once the power rises above upper power threshold.

paramInformation.label: Overload safety switch
paramInformation.description: Turn off the controlled device in case of exceeding the defined power for more than 3 seconds.

paramInformation.label: Power threshold
paramInformation.description: Sets the power threshold for triggering the program started notification.

paramInformation.label: Time interval
paramInformation.description: Sets the time interval for triggering the Program completed notification.

paramInformation.label: Turn Smart Plug OFF
paramInformation.description: Turns OFF once the time interval is expired and the Program completed notification is sent to the controller.

paramInformation.label: Enable/disable LED
paramInformation.description: This function allows enabling or disabling the Smart Plug LED.
